upload.invalidSaveFile: Bitte benutze eine Datei im gültigen Format. (.lsd Format).

errors.confirmPasswordMismatch: The specified passwords do not match.

errors.emailTaken: The specified email address is already in use.
errors.usernameTaken: The specified username is already in use.

parties.emptyMessage: There are currently no active parties.

tips.backupReminder: It is recommended that you keep a local backup of your progress by regularly downloading your save. This way, if your browser data is cleared, you won't lose your progress.
tips.menuTheme: Your name color and player list entry style are based on your in-game menu theme.
tips.playersInMap: You can switch between the number of players online and the number of players in your map by clicking the label.
tips.globalChatLocation: You can view the location a global chat message was sent from by hovering over or clicking the globe icon to the left of the message. It will also show or hide future global chat message locations based on your last show or hide.
tips.markdownSupport: Chat supports text formatting by wrapping text in certain characters. Currently supported are: **bold** (\*\*text\*\*), *italic* (\*text\*, \_text\_), __underline__ (\_\_text\_\_), ~~strikethrough~~ (\~\~text\~\~), and ||spoiler|| (\|\|text\|\|).
tips.tabToChat: If you're playing on a PC, you can press the tab key to toggle between the game and the chat input. This feature can be disabled in the settings under 'Press Tab to Chat'.
tips.chatTabNotifications: When you are in a chat tab other than 'All', if a new message is sent in the other filtered tab, it will add bolding to the tab label to notify you.
tips.clearChat: When you click the clear chat button at the top right of the chat box, if you are not currently in the 'All' tab, it will only remove messages for the current chat tab you're on.
tips.parties: Parties are a great way to stick together with people on an adventure. You can see the locations of your party members and talk to them in a private chat.
tips.immersionMode: If you prefer a more immersive experience rather than a social one, try Immersion Mode. It turns off global chat, the player list, and player counts so it's more interesting when you find another player while exploring.
tips.openSource: YNOproject is open source and the code repositories are available at https://github.com/ynoproject/

saveSync.confirmEnable: Do you want to enable Save Sync? Your data from the Save Sync Slot will be uploaded and you will be able to access it from this account on any device or browser that has this feature enabled. While enabled, the specified Save Sync Slot's data will be updated automatically upon loading the page.
saveSync.confirmEnableWithData: Previous Save Sync data was found for this account. A save stored in the Save Sync Slot will be overwritten with Save Sync data if a newer one exists in the same slot. Please note that this will only take affect upon reloading the page with this feature enabled. Are you sure you want to enable Save Sync?
